short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyRugStore is a leading UK online rugs and runners retailer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MyRugStore.co.uk is renowned for their selection of high quality rugs, including contemporary designer collections, exclusive traditional ranges as well as specialist oversized and circle rugs.  With over 1,000 products to suit all tastes and budgets, from luxurious shaggy rugs, minimalist modern designs and traditional oriental pieces to choose from, MyRugStore.co.uk make re-designing your living space affordable and fun. 

MyRugStore’s application take you directly to the official website where you can browse their impressive collections with ease, sort available products by colour, size and quality as well as magnify the life style and close up images of each product, making your shopping experience visual and stress free.

As featured in one of the most popular makeover show on Channel 5 and recommended by hundreds of satisfied customers’ reviews.
